short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts images between WEBP, JPG, GIF, and PNG formats and extracts metadata from them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

🔥 This extension allows you to easily convert WEBP files to PNG directly from Google Chrome. Simply select the WEBP file on your computer, and the extension will take care of the rest, converting the WEBP file to PNG and allowing you to download the image.

⚡️ In addition to converting from WEBP to PNG, this extension also converts WEBP to JPG, GIF, and vice versa. This means you can convert any image to the format you desire using this extension. Simply select the image file on your computer, and the extension will handle the conversion, allowing you to download the converted image.

📊 WEBP to PNG Converter also provides the capability to read and extract a wide range of metadata from images, such as dimensions, file size, creation date, and more, offering you valuable information about your image files during the conversion process.
